item.description:
Da jia hao,

Tomorrow evening, join us at the Boston Foundation 75 Arlington St 10th floor
for the

Annual Meeting of BCNC Boston Chinatown Neighborhood Center
6-8p

BCNC kindly hosts our monthly Meetup meetings in Chinatown- come support them with your presence as the challenges and accomplishments of last year, and the coming year are reviewed! It's a great chance to meet the Director, Board and Advisory Board, mingle with other supporters, people with an interest in Chinese culture and language, and meet some neighbors. Light refereshments and a short speaking program including a presentation by a youth constituent.

RSVP to BCNC at 617-635-5129!

The Boston Foundation | info@tbf.org | 75 Arlington Street, 10th Floor, Boston, MA 02116.
Main Tel 617-338-1700

BCNC website
About this Meetup Group

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tues 5/19 6p BCNC Annual Mtg @ 75 Arlington St
